## isCoordinateOccupied() function

Determine if there is at least one tile at the given coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isCoordinateOccupied(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): boolean;
```

**Returns:**

boolean

true if there is at least one tile at the given coordinate, false otherwise.
